div.p: J.W. had the idea for and designed the experiments. J.W. and W.H. supervised the work. Y.M. and Y.K. carried out the device fabrication and characterizations and HRTEM measurement. W.Z., M.X. L.Z., Y.T., W.X. and R.L. conducted the optical measurements. R.Y. and Y.W. participated in device fabrication and characterizations. Y.C. measured SEM. Y.S., J.L. and H.H. carried out TCSPC characterizations. Y.M. and F.G. performed the FTPS measurement, J.W. wrote the first draft of the paper. N.W., Y.J., and W.H. participated in data analysis and provided major revisions. All authors discussed the results and commented on the paper.
